text: Srećko Štiglić (11 June 1943 - 10 September 2020) was a Croatian hammer thrower. He competed for SFR Yugoslavia in the 1972 Summer Olympics. Štiglić's personal best was 70.10 m, set in 1981. He was born in Zagreb, Yugoslavia. Štiglić died on 10 September 2020 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Croatian athletes Category:Olympians for Croatia Category:Yugoslavian athletes Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia Category:Hammer throwers Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb
title: Srećko Štiglić
